Analyze the following text: An electronic circuit for amplifying an electrical input signal including a first input component VCORin and a second input component VQUADin which have one and the same period and are in phase quadrature said electronic circuit comprisingan amplifier 2 including a first input terminal and a first output terminal the first input terminal being coupleable to a first input capacitor Ci1 the charge of which varies as a function of said electrical input signala first feedback capacitor Cr1 connected between the first input terminal and the first output terminal of the amplifier 2 anda first switch RESET1 configured to operate alternatively in a first operating mode where it is configured to discharge said first feedback capacitor Cr1 and a second operating mode where it is open said electronic circuit being configured to amplify said electrical input signal as a function of the value of capacitance present between the first input terminal and the first output terminal of the amplifier 2 said electronic circuit further comprisinga first additional capacitor CRES1 anda first coupling circuit RD1 RD2 configured to operate alternatively in a respective first operating modewhere it connects the first additional capacitor CRES1 in parallel to the first feedback capacitor Cr1 and in a respective second operating mode where it decouples the first additional capacitor CRES1 from the first feedback capacitor Cr1and wherein said first switch RESET1 is configured to switch from the first operating mode to the second operating mode at a first instant t2 in which one VCORin of the first and second input components VCORin VQUADin assumes a first zero value and in which the other VQUADin of said first and second input components VCORin VQUADin assumes a nonzero value in such a way that following upon said first instant t2 the amplifier 2 generates an electrical output signal including a first output component VCORout and a second output component VQUADout which are a function of the first and second input components VCORin VQUADinrespectively the output component VQUADout that is a function of said other VQUADin of said first and second input components VCORin VQUADin differing at said first instant t2 from a corresponding first ideal value said first ideal value being a function of said nonzero value and of a steadystate gain value equal to the gain of said electronic circuit when the first switch RESET1 and the first coupling circuit RD1 RD2 operate in the respectivesecond operating mode and wherein the first coupling circuit RD1 RD2 is configured to carry out a switching from the respective first operating mode to the respective second operating mode in a way synchronous with a second instant t3 which is at a distance in time from the first instant t2 that is half of said period and in which said one VCORin of the first and second input components VCORin VQUADin assumes a second zero value in such a way that following upon said switching said electronic circuit amplifies both the first input component VCORin and the second input component VQUADin with a gain equal to said steadystate gain value and wherein the first coupling circuit RD1 RD2 is further configured to operate between said first instant t2 and said switching in such a way that when said switching takes place the output component VQUADout that is a function of said other VQUADin of said first and second input components VCORin VQUADin is equal to a corresponding second ideal value said second ideal value being a function of said steadystate gain value and of the value assumed by said other VQUADin of said first and second input components VCORin VQUADin when said switching takes place.
